findings.title: Authorized account can change the maximum transaction amount.
findings.description: The authorized account has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Authorized account can include in and exclude from dividends.
findings.description: The authorized account has the privilege to include or exclude accounts from receiving dividends.

findings.title: Authorized account can include in and exclude from fee and transaction amount
findings.description: The authorized account has the privilege to modify fees and transaction amounts, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Authorized account can change fees
findings.description: The authorized account has the privilege to modify fee settings.

findings.title: Authorized account can change fee receivers.
findings.description: The authorized account has the privilege to modify the fee receivers, which could lead to unauthorized access and manipulation of fees.

findings.title: Authorized account can change swap threshold and disable/enable swap
findings.description: The authorized account has the capability to modify the swap threshold and enable or disable the swap functionality.

findings.title: Authorized account can change target liquidity values
findings.description: The authorized account has the capability to modify target liquidity values, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Authorized account can change distribution criteria.
findings.description: The authorized account has the privilege to modify the distribution criteria, which could lead to unintended consequences or malicious activities.

findings.title: Authorized account can change distribution GAS
findings.description: The authorized account has the privilege to modify the distribution gas settings, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw BNBs to the marketing receiver address.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw BNBs to the marketing receiver address without any restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can change trading status.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the trading status of the contract.

findings.title: Owner can change cooldown status
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the cooldown status.

findings.title: Authorized account can change buybackKeepItSimple value
findings.description: The authorized account has the privilege to modify the buybackKeepItSimple value, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Authorized account can change addresses' isTimelockExempt value
findings.description: The authorized account has the privilege to modify the isTimelockExempt value associated with specific addresses.

findings.title: Owner can change max wallet amount restriction.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount, which may lead to unintended consequences or security risks.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw REWARD tokens from the contract.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw REWARD tokens from the contract without any restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can change distributor.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the distributor which may lead to unauthorized changes and potential security risks.

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit.
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to a Denial of Service (DoS) attack due to block gas limit issues.
